messages.text: Hi Sophia, Thanks again for your time last week. I’ve attached the formal proposal for the Sales Suite Upgrade. It includes the AI enhancement bundle and reflects the 8% discount we discussed. Let me know if you’d like to go over any specifics. Best, Bruce
Hi Bruce, Appreciate the quick turnaround. This looks aligned overall — I’ll forward it to our RevOps lead and circle back with any questions. Regards, Sophia
Hi Sophia, Just wanted to check if your team had a chance to review the proposal. We’re flexible on start dates if that helps align internally. Cheers, Bruce
Hey Bruce, Just got some initial feedback. They’re mostly aligned — only question was whether implementation support is included in the first month. – Sophia

Yes — full onboarding and implementation support are included for the first 30 days at no extra cost. I’ll highlight that in a revised version. Also happy to get on Slack if that’s easier for your side. Best, Bruce
That helps a lot, thank you. Feel free to send the updated doc. And yes — let's move this to Slack, it’s faster for us at this point. I’ve sent you a dm on slack. Thanks, Sophia
Got the invite — thank you. Uploading the revised version now. Looking forward to wrapping this up smoothly. Talk soon, Bruce

summary: The sales rep, Bruce Wayne, sent a proposal for Salesforce Sales Suite Upgrade to Sophia Nguyen at Airbnb. Sophia acknowledged receipt, raised a question about implementation support, which Bruce clarified. They agreed to move the conversation to Slack, and Bruce confirmed he is uploading the revised document.
